title: Opinion: LA Metro Wants Lyft to Run Their Bike Share System. That May Not Be a Good Idea
content:
LA Metro seems but certain to award Lyft with a contract to operate its bike share for the next 11 years. That could prove to be a detrimental decision.

Read the full article at Opinion: LA Metro Wants Lyft to Run Their Bike Share System. That May Not Be a Good Idea on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
